duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive business-to-business sales and build a book of residual income through strategic outreach and client acquisition.
Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to meet and exceed business goals and revenue targets.
Prioritize opportunities and manage multiple touch points to drive outcomes and ensure follow-through on sales activities.
Engage in face-to-face networking, critical business discussions, and consultative selling to address business owners' needs.
Maintain and grow client relationships to drive future revenue growth, focusing on compelling communication and persistence.
Utilize a custom CRM platform to optimize client acquisition and streamline sales processes.
Participate in sales training and utilize provided support to maintain high standards and achieve earning potential.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
